live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
35838.summary: Some customers in the Glenmore Highlands area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35838.title: Apr 6 – Glenmore Highlands (Kelowna) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
